description: The address and additional information will be emailed to attendees before the event.
Woodland Critters is hosted on privately owned land.
items: Follow posted signs along the route to the event. Please avoid disrupting our neighbors.
The inside of the cabin and garage are off limits to attendees.
Do not wander past marked property lines.
Keep noise level down to a reasonable volume during sleeping hours.

description: The mountains of Donner Pass are dry, heavily forested and high altitude. In July, expect:
items: Averages of 75*F / 47*F
Flowing rivers. Take care not to wade in it, as the current will be strong.
Yellow jackets. Traps will be laid out well in advance.
Dry ground and brush. Fire danger will be high - please use the provided fire pits.
Light wind.
Little to no rainfall.
Wildlife. Be cognizant of leaving food out.
Low possibility of smoke due to wildfires.
Power
Potable Water
Porta-Potties
Camp kitchen
Showers
Firepits
Medical Tent

description: Pets are allowed! We expect dogs, but if you are bringing another kind of pet, please let the hosts know if you need any extra accommodations.
items: Please clean up after your pet.
If the situation calls for it, we may have to ask you to keep your dog on a leash.
The hosts are not responsible for injuries or altercations, but will do our best to provide aid when necessary.
